data.name: YouTube Studio Dark Mode
data.description: Dark Mode for YouTube Studio (Creator Control Panel / My Videos) because although the main site has it as default now, there is no option for their blindingly white control panel. It affects the Edit Video page and every other page under the YouTube Studio / My Video page.

data.name: ChessTempo Fritz (Black-White)
data.description: Adds Fritz pieces to chessboard on chesstempo.com

data.name: 2020 Libero Mail
data.description:
This customization makes the LiberoMail site very simple and free from unnecessary frills.
Update: 14 FEBRUARY 2020

data.name: AWS Console condensed toolbar
data.description: Removes spacing & reduce font size to fit more icons

data.name: Dark PokedexTracker
data.description: Makes PokedexTracker.com a little easier to see during the night.

data.name: timezone.io dark
Hyperlink Color Changer for Chrome Dark Mode
data.description:
Chrome Dark Mode forces the color #0000EE (blue) to change to nearly #551A8B (purple).
This style changes the hyperlink slightly to match the standard colorset.
You can copy this code as a usercss.

data.name: AWS Console - Dark
data.description: Gives you night mode for AWS console

data.name: IMDB for dark rooms - One Piece
data.description:
I made this Style for dark rooms, or if you just want something that's easier on the eyes.

If you have any problems, or suggestions  let me know.

If you like the style please Like and Share it.
